For Points

by SlyDog Studios

Released May 22, 2014
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM (sha-1: 4805470611f46d1a07665544fa3671c9ca6263de)

Play now

Description

Why did the chicken cross the road? For Points, of course! Get the chicken across the road to get some points. Don't get hit by a car though. Chickens are pretty defenseless against cars. One hit and it's game over. Game created by SlyDog Studios.
